message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, let's try a bit more realistic!
I'm willing to give a bit more, but not that much!
You're still not giving me enough, let's try to be more realistic about the value of money!
I'm getting closer to your expectations, but still not there!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. I'm willing to compromise, but not much more!
I'm not willing to give up much more, but I'll try to meet you halfway!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share to make it worth my while. This is my final offer!
I'm not going to give in to your demands, I'll make one last stand!
